param.name: useFlashHeader
param.label: Enable Flash Header?
param.description: Here you can on / off the Flash Header xD

param.name: useJavascript
param.label: Use Javascript Effects?
param.description: Here you can on / off the Javascript effects in your Template

param.name: showSitetitle
param.label: Show the Joomla Sitetitle?
param.description: Show Joomla Configuration Sitetitle in the Header? Yes or No.

param.name: FontSize
param.label: Sitetitle Font Size
param.description: Font Size of the Sitetitle in Pixel - Just play a bit with this to find out your best setting - default = 36

param.name: FontColor
param.label: Sitetitle Color
param.description: Color of the Sitetitle in Hexacode - default: #000000 = BLACK

param.name: useFade
param.label: Sitetitle Fade In onload?
param.description: Here you can on / off the Fade In effect (Javascript) for the Sitetitle in the Header

param.name: HomeLink
param.label: Home - Link destination
param.description: Enter the link desination of the Home Link in the Header

param.name: HomeLinkTitle
param.label: Title of Home Link
param.description: Enter the Title of the Home Link. (shown on Mouseover)
